[Home](./index.md) &gt; [shieldbow](./shieldbow.md) &gt; [LeagueManager](./shieldbow.leaguemanager.md) &gt; [fetchByQueueAndTier](./shieldbow.leaguemanager.fetchbyqueueandtier.md)

## LeagueManager.fetchByQueueAndTier() method

Fetch a collection of league entries by the queue type, tier and division.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetchByQueueAndTier(queue: QueueType, tier: TierType, division: DivisionType, page?: number): Promise<Collection<string, LeagueEntry>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  queue | [QueueType](./shieldbow.queuetype.md) | The type of queue - RANKED\_SOLO\_5x5, RANKED\_FLEX\_SR, etc. |
|  tier | [TierType](./shieldbow.tiertype.md) | The tier of the entries - IRON to CHALLENGER. |
|  division | [DivisionType](./shieldbow.divisiontype.md) | The division of the entries - I, II, III, IV. |
|  page | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The page number (defaults to 1). |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Collection&lt;string, [LeagueEntry](./shieldbow.leagueentry.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;
